Interface FilterOptions

Constructor options for Filter class.

interface FilterOptions {
    emptyList?: boolean;
    exclude?: string[];
    list?: string[];
    placeHolder?: string;
    regex?: RegExp;
    replaceRegex?: RegExp;
    splitRegex?: RegExp;
}
